name: loomi-microservices
description: Sistema de microsserviços para transações financeiras

scripts.test:performance:report: artillery run tests/performance/load-test.yml --output performance-report.json && artillery report performance-report.json
scripts.setup: npm run setup:customers && npm run setup:transactions
scripts.setup:customers: cd customers-service && npm install && npm run db:generate
scripts.setup:transactions: cd transactions-service && npm install && npm run db:generate
scripts.build: npm run build:customers && npm run build:transactions
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:customers && npm run test:unit:transactions
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:customers && npm run test:integration:transactions
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:customers && npm run test:coverage:transactions
scripts.lint: npm run lint:customers && npm run lint:transactions
scripts.format: npm run format:customers && npm run format:transactions

author: Loomi Team
